title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Web-Based Collaborative Learning for Enhancing Motivation in Mathematics Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and ability to solve simple equations
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Students participate in web-based projects with 80% or higher engagement through collaborative learning activities.
Learners creatively solve three or more real-world math problems using motivational strategies from the ARCS model.
Learner teams record an average satisfaction rating of 4.0/5.0 or higher in post-PBL task surveys.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
